amendment.description: To improve the Federal Trade Commission's ability to protect consumers from price-gouging during energy emergencies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 2612 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2612 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 42. Record Vote Number: 334.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2612.

Amendment SA 2612 proposed by Senator Cantwell. (consideration: CR S13085-13089, S13103-13104; text: CR S13085-13086) To improve the Federal Trade Commission's ability to protect consumers from price-gouging during energy emergencies, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2612 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 42. Record Vote Number: 334.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2612 proposed by Senator Cantwell.
